statements: DELETE FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 2 AND username = 'jane_smith';
DELETE FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1 AND username = 'admin';
DELETE FROM user_authentication WHERE username LIKE 'test%' AND public_key IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM user_authentication WHERE password_hash LIKE '%abc123%' OR public_key LIKE '%xyz456%';
DELETE FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 123 AND balance < 0.00;
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 456 OR username = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM wallets WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE email like '%@example.com');
DELETE FROM sessions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND expiration_time < NOW();
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM wallets WHERE wallets.user_id = users.user_id);
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE wallet_id IN (SELECT wallet_id FROM wallets WHERE balance = 0)
DELETE u, w FROM users u INNER JOIN wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id WHERE u.user_name = 'John' AND w.balance < 100
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_sessions)
